achievements.label: Coming Back to Port
achievements.descriptionUnlocked: The end of a voyage? Or the beginning of a new one?

achievements.label: Tailoring My Crew
achievements.unlockmessage: I need to best tools for the task to come.
achievements.descriptionUnlocked: I decided to spend more to hire specialists.

achievements.label: Inspired By Nature
achievements.unlockmessage: "In all things of nature there is something of the marvelous." -Aristotle
achievements.descriptionUnlocked: What is without, within. What is mundane, Glorious.

achievements.label: Inspired By a Muse
achievements.unlockmessage: When her very being is music, every word is a symphony, every step a performance
achievements.descriptionUnlocked: I used a Muse for inspiration, and read music from the human form.

achievements.label: The Orphean Arts
achievements.unlockmessage: On the stage, what is True and what is Real may trade places, and dance a merry jig. I stood in that moment, and conducted that dance.
achievements.descriptionUnlocked: With the stage my temple, and the audience my unwitting flock, I worked a miracle.

achievements.label: Instrument Acquired
achievements.unlockmessage: A foreign object now, but soon as familiar as my own limbs
achievements.descriptionUnlocked: I have acquired an instrument, and extended music further than voice alone.

achievements.label: Decomposition
achievements.unlockmessage: Even Discarded things undergo one last transformation.
achievements.descriptionUnlocked: I have followed the tale of the Dancer to its disrupted end.

achievements.label: Hiraezh
achievements.unlockmessage: Anguish can be both lesson and reward.
achievements.descriptionUnlocked: I have discovered the hiraezh of a guilty sovereign, and interrupted her holy vigil.

achievements.label: Character Mended
achievements.unlockmessage: By starlight stitching, what was torn asunder can again be mended as one.
achievements.descriptionUnlocked: The first shreds of my soul have been pulled together. I am closer to my Other Half. We are closer to being whole.
